name: Community Living Opportunities, INC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Community Living Opportunities, INC is a Community Based Residential Treatment Facility, Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities provider based in Lenexa, KS. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $27.6M in Medicaid payments across 157K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $27.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
